data.actual_result: Discord will stop working/freeze when you tap on two people at the same time.
data.expected_result: You should be able to invite both of those people, and Discord works fine after.
data.short_description: When inviting people to a Group DM, if you tap on two people at the same time, Discord will just stop working.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the "Invite People" for the Group DM - When inviting tap on two people at the same time - Discord will stop working.
